500_BODY: We are sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, contact our customer support.
CONFIRM_I_HAVE_READ: Please confirm you have read and agree with the terms of using the platform.
CO_AUTHORS_TEXT: Good initiatives emerge from collective effort. Invite co-authors to the initiative, either by name or e-mail addresses. Co-authors have the same rights as you. Co-authors can be added later during the co-creation of the initiative.
DEADLINE_ERR: Deadline must be at least {{days}} days in the future.
DEADLINE_EXPLANATION:
Set the time-frame for the co-creation phase: select the deadline date from the calendar. Your initiative will be in a discussion state for at least three days from publication, but we recommend a longer period (for example, a month).
If necessary, you can later extend the co-creation period.
EXPLANATION_CONTENT:
Good initiatives are born out of discussions. That's why created initiatives have a three-day debate state by default; this means that you can collect digital signatures to your initiative within three days after the creation of the initiative. Use this opportunity to define the subject with like-minded people and, when the time comes, publish your initiative to create a broader discussion, co-write the text of the initiative and eventually collect signatures in support of the initiative.

The creation of initiatives and sending to Riigikogu is free, but donations for maintaining the platform are very welcome.
FIRST_PROCEEDING_TITLE: Initiative was sent to the parliament
HEADING_CAST_YOUR_VOTE: Cast your vote to this initiative!
HEADING_VOTE_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: You can sign with the help of an ID card or mobile ID. You cannot sign without identifying yourself.
HOME_WELCOME:
Do you feel like some things could be done better in Estonia? Or that some regulations could be changed? 
Rahvaalgatus.ee enables you to compile and send collective addresses - with at least 1000 digital signatures - to the parliament of Estonia. Also, you can follow whether your proposal will be turned into draft act.
HOME_WELCOME_TITLE: Welcome to the home of citizen initiatives!
INITIATIVE_DEFAULT_HTML:
{{title}}


Short (about 350 characters) or tweets - short (140 characters) summary – it is aimed at the better reflection of initiatives in the platform and social media


Proposal


What change is wanted


Justification


Why is it important


This whole text volume is a maximum of 12,000 characters
INITIATIVE_SIDEBAR_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to be informed via email
INITIATIVE_SIGN_PHASE_UPDATED: Initiative is now open for signing.
INVALID_FORM: Sorry, but there seems to be a mistake
I_HAVE_READ: I have read and agree with the terms of using rahvaalgatus.ee.
LOGIN_TO_CREATE_TOPIC: You need to log in in order to create an initiative!
MAKE_SURE_CONTROL_CODE: Make sure the control code matches with the one on your phone screen and enter PIN2 code of your mobile ID.
MSG_ERROR_40010_TOPIC: You cannot leave this topic as you are the last user with administrator permissions. To leave, please assign a new administrator to this discussion or initiative.
MSG_ERROR_40010_VOTE: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not casted.
MSG_ERROR_40011_VOTE: The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
MSG_ERROR_40012_VOTE: The signature is invalid. Your vote was not casted.
MSG_ERROR_40013_VOTE: The mobile ID functionality of your phone is not yet ready. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40014_VOTE: Mobile signing was not successful. Your phone is either switched off or out of coverage.
MSG_ERROR_40015_VOTE: Mobile signing was not successful. Either your phone is incapable of receiving the message or there is a problem with messaging service.
MSG_ERROR_40016_VOTE: Error in phone SIM application. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40017_VOTE: Your signature has been revoked. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40020_VOTE: Incorrect phone number and/or personal identification code. Phone number has to include the country code: +372 xxx xxxx.
MSG_ERROR_40021_VOTE: Mobile ID functionality is not supported. Please double check phone number and/or ID code.
MSG_ERROR_40022_VOTE: Your certificate has been suspended or revoked. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40023_VOTE: Your certificate has not been activated. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40024_VOTE: Your certificate has been suspended. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40025_VOTE: Your certificate has expired. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40026_VOTE: Unknown certificate. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40030_VOTE: Personal identification code is already connected to another user account. Signing initiatives with the same code from different user accounts is not allowed.
MSG_ERROR_40031_VOTE: User account is already connected to another personal identification code. Signing initiatives with the same account but with different personal identification codes is not allowed.
MSG_ERROR_50000: We are sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NOT_ALLOWED: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit the website installer.id.ee to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_CERTIFICATES: No card in reader. Check if the ID card is inserted correctly to the reader. New ID cards have chip on the back side of the card.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_IMPLEMENTATION: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit the website installer.id.ee to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_TECHNICAL_ERROR: We're sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_USER_CANCEL: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not casted.
MSG_ERROR_INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: Invalid phone number. Please enter your phone number with the country code: +372 xxx xxxx.
PLACEHOLDER_ADD_YOUR_REPLY: Add your reply to the comment by {{name}}
SENT_TO_PARLIAMENT_CONTENT:
The initiative has been sent to Riigikogu! 

The parliament has 30 days to decide whether to process the initiative. If the initiative corresponds to the criteria of collective addresses, the Chancellery of the Riigikogu will inform the author of the initiative about which commission will discuss the initiative. This information will be publicized on Rahvaalgatus as well.
SIGNATURES_COLLECTED: Enough votes collected for sending to parliament.
SUBSCRIBE_TO_INITIATIVES_EXPLANATION: We'll email you about all initiatives in the parliament. If you'd like to subscribe to a single initiative, go to its page and subscribe from the sidebar.
SUPPORT_REDIRECT: To make a donation, you will be directed to Maksekeskus (Payment Centre), where you can make the transfer via your internet bank.
THANKS_FOR_SIGNING_AGAIN: Thanks, though you've already signed the initiative.
TITLE_FIELD: Insert the topic of your initiative (you can change it later)
TXT_ALL_DISCUSSIONS_AND_VOTES_DELETED: All discussions and votes will be deleted.
TXT_TOPIC_COMMENT_LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
VOTE_DEADLINE_EXPLANATION: Renew deadline and confirm text. Your initiative will be sent to voting in this form until the selected date.
VOTING_FAILED:
Collecting signatures has ended. You cannot sign this initiatives anymore. Since the initiative did not get the necessary minimum amount (1000 signatures) by the set deadline, the initiative is stopped by authors.
Rahvaalgatus.ee keeps the collected signatures for one year in case the initiative will be re-opened for signing.
VOTING_SUCCEEDED:
Collecting signatures has ended successfully! You cannot sign this initiative anymore. 
As a next thing, the authors of the initiative will send the initiative along with collected signatures to the Parliament of Estonia. 
Since the parliament can process the initiative for a while, we recommend you to order notifications for this initiative "Keep me informed".
